Title: Extends the effectiveness of certain provisions requiring the office for people with developmental disabilities to establish the care demonstration program
Summary: Extends the effectiveness of certain provisions requiring the office for people with developmental disabilities to establish the care demonstration program to March 31, 2028.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 670 of the laws of 2021, requiring the office for people with developmental disabilities to establish the care demonstration program, in relation to the establishment of a care demonstration program and the effectiveness thereof
